title: INTEGRATION_gripper test fails to run on default

content.raw:
The `INTEGRATION_gripper` test has been failing to run since pull request #2523:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/BuildCopTests/job/gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/170/testReport/junit/(root)/INTEGRATION_gripper/test_ran/

It also failed during the `ci-pr_any` jobs:

* http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/802/
* http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/781/
* http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/276/

cc: @nkoenig @iche033 @chapulina
